Taj Mahal.DESCRIPTION: A white marble mausoleum, a symbol of love.

Christ the Redeemer.DESCRIPTION: A giant statue of Jesus Christ on Corcovado mountain.

Santorini.DESCRIPTION: A stunning island known for its white-washed buildings and blue-domed churches.
